QuestData.Title: Cutting Losses
QuestData.Description: I've spent the last week starin' at this ugly pit trying to think of how to exploit a bunch of dangerous, violent arthropods for profit. Now I'm out of ideas, and starving.$B$BThese things are a wash, and I say it's time to start clearing them out. Head down into that pit and start killin' bugs.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 15 Hazzali Silithid of any kind in the Gaping Chasm.
QuestData.CompletionText: There's still plenty of those things out there, pal. Keep at it!
QuestData.RewardText: This isn't goin' fast enough. There's gotta be a faster way...
